title: Hamiltonian Simulation Guide
subtitle: Hamiltonian Simulation
description: Implementation of quantum Hamiltonian simulation: modeling time evolution of quantum systems using Classiq. The guide introduces Suzuki-Trotter decomposition and qDRIFT product formulas, with exponentiation under depth constraints, and links to block-encoding methods. Applications include chemistry, materials science, and algorithms such as HHL and Gibbs state sampling.
